.switch{display:inline-block}.switch:focus{outline:2px solid #0071bd}.switch:active,.switch:hover{outline:none}.slider{position:relative;padding:2px;width:46px;border-radius:15px;background:#cacacc;cursor:pointer}.slider,.slider:before{display:block;height:26px}.slider:before{left:0;content:"";width:26px;border-radius:50%;background:#fff;transition:.25s}.switch input{display:none}.switch input:checked+.slider{background:#27bf91}.switch input:checked+.slider:before{-webkit-transform:translateX(20px);transform:translateX(20px)}.switch input:disabled+.slider{opacity:.5;cursor:default}
